Detailed Description

Superclass holding a type of information about a user.

virtual uint32 UserElement::getSize (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the size of the allocated variables and elements.

Used to make sure that the element fits in a packet.

Returns:
size of the element packed into a packet. If the precise size isn't known the maximum possible size is used.

Reimplemented in UserUser, UserCellular, UserBuddyList, UserNavigator, UserRegionAccess, UserWayfinderSubscription, UserToken, UserPIN, UserLastClient, UserIDKey, UserLicenceKey, and UserRight.

void UserElement::makeSQLOnlyDate (  uint32  time,
char *  dateStr
)  [static]
 

Turns an unix date 1 Jan 1970 into a SQL DATE and TIME.

Eg. '2000-01-21'

Parameters:
time is the unix time.
date is where to print the date, at least 12 chars long.
